data.title: Epiphone Wilshire Phant-O-Matic
data.meta_description: Huh, just found this on Musician's Friend. I couldn't find a topic on this new Wilshire. The Epiphone Wilshire Phant-O-Matic Electric Guitar was designed in collaboration with Frank Iero, guitarist for multi-platinum band My Chemical Romance, and combines an incredible array of features that only...
data.text:
There actually are a couple of threads on the Phant-O-Matic

http://forum.gibson.com/index.php?/topic/72109-wilshire-phant-o-matic/page__p__981409__hl__phant-o-matic__fromsearch__1#entry981409

http://forum.gibson.com/index.php?/topic/58065-who-is-this-old-friend/page__st__20__p__984113__hl__phant-o-matic__fromsearch__1#entry984113

But I've been tracking this guitar since last November, so I've kept an eye out for conversations about it.

It was originally supposed to ship in August and has now been pushed to October. I'm hoping that they don't move it again!

Batwing, who knows, maybe they will do a Crestwood Deluxe or Custom. Seems like it would be pretty easy since all the parts are more or less in production on other models right now.
